page.title: 02Employment
page.content: In our area there are a number of small businesses and some people are self-employed. Most people work on farms. Lots of ladies are housewives and some people are builders. In the village of Milton there is a post office where the owners live and work. There is a garage with the post office which also sells sweets, vegetables, fruit and tinned food. In this area there are no factories although there are two nurseries; one in Milton and one in Wyke. There is one public house but no restaurants. There are ten farms in the area,so there is quite a lot of employment for farm workers.
